TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDOMImplementationSource implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This interface permits a DOM implementer to supply one or more implementations, based upon requested features and versions, as specified in .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Org.W3c.Dom.IDOMImplementation GetDOMImplementation(string features) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that specifies which features and versions are required. This is a space separated list in which each feature is specified by its name optionally followed by a space and a version number. This method returns the first item of the list returned by getDOMImplementationList. As an example, the string "XML 3.0 Traversal +Events 2.0" will request a DOM implementation that supports the module "XML" for its 3.0 version, a module that support of the "Traversal" module for any version, and the module "Events" for its 2.0 version. The module "Events" must be accessible using the method Node.getFeature() and DOMImplementation.getFeature().
Docs.summary: A method to request the first DOM implementation that supports the specified features.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Org.W3c.Dom.IDOMImplementationList GetDOMImplementationList(string features) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that specifies which features and versions are required. This is a space separated list in which each feature is specified by its name optionally followed by a space and a version number. This is something like: "XML 3.0 Traversal +Events 2.0"
Docs.summary: A method to request a list of DOM implementations that support the specified features and versions, as specified in .
